title: Very spacious 1 Bed 1.1 Bath CONDO
posting_body: ['Very spacious 1 Bed Bath 1 1/2, granite counter on both bathrooms, laminate wood floor, kitchen appliances: dishwasher, oven, microwave, refrigerator, new kitchen cabinets and granite countertop.', 'Very cozy apartment.', 'Conveniently located near shoppings, airports, beaches.', 'Close to main highways I-95, SR-7, and Florida Turnpike.', '24 Hours concierge, club house with large pool.', 'Driving Directions: Broker Remarks: Available on August 11,2022.', 'Listing Agent available ONLY through whatsapp and email.', '4200 Hillcrest Dr # 706 HOLLYWOOD, FL 33021-7948', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTA11247782', 'Type of Property: CONDO', 'List Price:\t$1,800', 'Bedrooms:  1', 'Bathrooms: 1.1', 'SqFt (Liv):¤844', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:Beachfront Realty Inc']
